 2012-10772012-09-20,  HC,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule l to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (MDPV)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE I TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (MDPV) in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians by listing Methylenedioxypyrovalerone which is a key ingredient in products known as "bath salts".
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0176 Publication Date: 2012-10-10
AttachmentsAttachment
